CustomField.description: Select the Documents you want COPIES to be mailed to this Contact. Used in conjunction with the Sales Credits specified in the Email Copies field. Note: These are Email COPIES only, originals are still emailed via the Email Selections and Invoice checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the Documents you want COPIES to be mailed to this Contact. Used in conjunction with the Sales Credits specified in the Email Copies field. Note: These are Email COPIES only, originals are emailed via the Email Selections and Invoice checkbox.
CustomField.label: Email Selections (COPIES)
